body:
Currently fails in `((IsAligned(p, page_size_))) != (0)" (0x0, 0x0)`. Any help to fix it or work around for now would be appreciated:

```

    #1 __sanitizer::CheckFailed(char const*, int, char const*, unsigned long long, unsigned long long) <null> (test_bitcoin+0x127745)
    #2 __tsan::user_free(__tsan::ThreadState*, unsigned long, void*, bool) <null> (test_bitcoin+0xf33ec)
    #3 operator delete(void*) <null> (test_bitcoin+0x135507)
    #4 __gnu_cxx::new_allocator<char>::deallocate(char*, unsigned long) /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7.3.0/../../../../include/c++/7.3.0/ext/new_allocator.h:125:2 (test_bitcoin+0x38d88)

    #7 std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_dispose() /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7.3.0/../../../../include/c++/7.3.0/bits/basic_string.h:221 (test_bitcoin+0x38d88)
    #8 std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::~basic_string() /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7.3.0/../../../../include/c++/7.3.0/bits/basic_string.h:647 (test_bitcoin+0x38d88)

    #11 _GLOBAL__sub_I_arith_uint256_tests.cpp /home/travis/build/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/src/test/arith_uint256_tests.cpp (test_bitcoin+0x38d88)

title: [WIP] travis: Run thread sanitizer
